Description: Vizen Analytics offers collaborative supply chain planning software, enabling manufacturers to optimize inventory stock and save money.
Full Description: Vizen Analytics helps manufacturing & distribution companies deliver better supply chain planning outcomes by increasing forecast visibility, accuracy and resilience. Our collaborative cloud-based software solution unites business silos and balances forward inventory through enhanced demand predictions and optimized supplier diversity enabling the right source material purchasing and lead-time forecast accuracy necessary to meet production outputs.  Our software continuously applies external geopolitical and socioeconomic data signals that impact supply chain performance. For example, Vizen forecasts the affect the war in Ukraine will have on the future price and supplier availability of certain raw materials up to nine (9) months into the future, reducing the effects of shortage gaming. Our proprietary causal modeling enhanced by next-gen AI reduces errors and avoids stock-out conditions. We deliver exceptional results – including how predictive analytics compares current inventory levels to future days stock. Greg Foster founded the Walla Walla, Washington-based company in 2020.

Description: The swiss kinfe for self-employed pros neatly packing everything needed to turn strangers into life-long clients
Full Description: Gigflow is dedicated to empowering self-employed professionals to take control of their careers and maximize their potential. We understand the challenges faced by freelancers in managing their businesses, from self-promotion and client acquisition to administrative tasks and financial management. Traditional freelancing platforms often come with limitations and drawbacks, such as transactional relationships, high fees, and limited control over client connections. At Gigflow, we offer an alternative approach. We believe that freelancers should have the freedom to find their own clients and manage the entire process themselves, without sacrificing efficiency or control. Our platform leverages cutting-edge technology to streamline and automate various aspects of freelancers' business operations. By providing specialized software for client acquisition, project management, invoicing, and financial tracking, we enable freelancers to focus on what they do best – their expertise – while minimizing the burden of administrative tasks. Gigflow eliminates the steep learning curve and reduces the need for external professionals, making it more feasible for freelancers to take charge of their client acquisition and management processes. Our efficient and user-friendly tools enhance productivity, strengthen client relationships, and ensure a more stable income stream. With Gigflow, freelancers can overcome the challenges associated with self-promotion, administrative tasks, and client management. We empower them to fully capitalize on the benefits of pursuing meaningful work aligned with their values, while creating thriving and sustainable businesses. Join Gigflow today and unlock the true potential of your freelance career.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Atlanta Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: SaaS digital wallet platform where game, league and contest operators can legally launch real money wagering into their apps
Full Description: Our story is not unlike yours if you're reading this now. We love sports, and love it even more when there's something on the line. ​What started out as a friendly Nassau golf bet between friends (dollar dollar dollar), grew into a wild ideas to build a platform for all kinds of friendly wagers. We saw that the gaming industry was infatuated about us all betting on others, while we got a lot more out of playing the games ourselves and having something on the line. ​We started with golf, developing the first peer-to-peer wagering platform for playing both local and remote challenges, while all along knowing it was bigger than golf.  Today, D3ST is a B2B sports & Fintech development company that builds products that create more opportunity for players to engage, wager and play their favorite games. Whether you're in the business of golf, pickle ball, trivia, bowling or cornhole, D3ST can help add wagering to your games and grow your revenue, without all the cost and legal compliance complexity. D3's API allows any app to add legal skill-based wagering with a proven solution. With more than 4 years of development and successfully navigating the complicated compliance landscape, D3 offers partners a turn-key solution at a fraction of the cost and time. Why D3? – API ready – Proven system over 4+ years – Low cost and low risk – Fast implementation – Legally compliant in over 100 Countries

Industry Groups: Apps, Gaming, Mobile, Software, Sports

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Construction, E-Commerce, Marketplace, Software, Training
Description: Our A.I assistant can find someone to take care of your problem, get a price for the service, and give you a few start times to choose from.
Full Description: Imagine an A.I assistant that can find someone qualified to take care of your problem, get an estimated price for the service, and give you a few start times to choose from.  Does this conversation sound familiar? I have this problem at ZIP code 39531. Can you fix it, when can you fix it and how much will it cost? Our A.I replies to that request with answers to each part. Example service request: “39531 toilet won’t flush” Example A.I assistant reply: Service Name: Toilet Repair (Won't Flush, Running, Clog) Estimated Price: $85 Soonest Arrival Window: 10/18 Thur, 9:00am-10:00am Click here to order this service Or find similar services here  Hometown Workforce is like DoorDash for services with an A.I assistant that helps consumers hire service providers. These people create a series of service listings on our marketplace. Consumers then pick the service they need, choose an available start time, and deposit 1% of the estimated total down. This 1% contractually obligates the person to show up on time and complete the work for the price estimated. If they don't they risk losing access to the platform.  This order process also runs the person's entire business. It manages payments, provides jobs, and schedules those jobs. All the person has to do is show up on time and do a good job. In exchange for this commitment to being honest and reliable, our tech can turn the skills of virtually anyone regardless of race, gender, background, or circumstances into a successful business. Angie's List and all the other lead gen sites do one thing. They connect consumers with contractors. They can't schedule the job. They can't verify the quality of work and they can't verify the price is fair. Without all 4 you can't effectively help consumers complete jobs. We take care of all 4 and more! MISSION STATEMENT: Our mission is to help eliminate poverty by turning people's skills into successful businesses. This is the first true solution to poverty I'm aware of. It's also perhaps the most powerful tool ever conceived for incentivizing people to be honest and reliable.  HOW OUR TECHNOLOGY WORKS: What makes this platform truly revolutionary is the series of listings people create on our marketplace. These listings pre-price and pre-timed their individual services.  Since each service is pre-priced we can standardize prices which eliminates price gouging, it also ensures the person gets paid.  Since each service is pre-timed the consumer can look at the person's work calendar and see all the available openings with enough hours to accommodate the specific job. Then they pick one which ensures the person shows up on time. It also provides them with jobs and manages every hour of every day. It tells the person where to go, what to do, and when to be there. There are billions of ordinary people who have skills people will pay for. They just have no idea how to turn those skills into a successful business. That’s exactly what Hometown Workforce does! We also have a training division that can provide people with skills. You choose a trade, we partner you with an instructor who will create listings specific to your career path. Consumers order those services and after you learn to do the work on the job. All the listings are turned over to you and instantly you have a successful business. Order services today: www.wfskills.com
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Education, Real Estate, Science and Engineering, Software

Industries: Autonomous Vehicles, CleanTech, Predictive Analytics, Robotics, Water
Description: We collect trash and water quality data from coastal waters using autonomous drones.
Full Description: Every year 11 million tons of trash enters our oceans, out of which, 6.6 million tons stays within coastal waters. This creates a large impact on waterfront coastal businesses, specifically marinas who are responsible for maintaining the cleanliness of their waters. As a result, Harmful algal blooms and marine debris create massive workflow inefficiencies by forcing employees to clean by hand. That's why we have created a "Roomba" for marinas that autonomously skims for trash, collects oil, and reads water data in live time. We give predictive analytics on the next pollution event and automate the cleanup processes so that marinas can run efficiently and stay informed about the health of their waters.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US

EVTOLs will allow once urban congested roads and freeways to possibly become parks or marketplaces. Airborne Motorworks’ patented propulsion technology, Electromagnetic-Gyroscopic Propulsion (EGP), is a new design for flight that has brought the dream of flying to our current reality. Being able to design Personal Air Vehicles (PAV) around our innovative propulsion system is the heart of what we do. Designed for function, safety, stability, affordability and style while achieving the once unrealized dream of personal flight, is our motivation and drive to make Airborne Motorworks’ Personal Airborne Vehicle the new normal in every household across the globe. Description: Nanosatellite launch services and hardware components
Full Description: Aphelion Aerospace, Inc. (DUNS # 074595993) was founded in March 2019 and is dedicated to developing launch solutions and products for the nanosatellite industry. Our business strategy relies on three core components (launch services, cubesat hardware and software) which allow us to provide a true turnkey, end-to-end space utilization solution. Realization of our vision relies on successful development of the Helios cubesat-class launch vehicle. The Helios nanolaunch system is a three-stage vertical launch vehicle with liquid propulsion in the first two stages and a solid propellant third stage. The design utilizes common propellants in the first two stages and a common engine design with nozzles optimized for altitude in a “plug cluster” aerospike configuration. Phoenix utilizes a unique hydrogen peroxide-based hypergolic propellant that eliminates the need for a separate ignition system but also is non-toxic, non-carcinogenic and the exhaust products are environmentally-friendly. This propellant family was fully developed and hot-fire qualified by Aphelion Orbitals, Inc. in 2018. We further matured the technology into Aphelion Aerospace's proprietary propellant mixture. The first stage is designed to be reusable using boostback, powered descent and vertical landing. Helios will be completely mobile and not rely on any fixed infrastructure, launch pad or processing facilities. The vehicle will be able to remain fully fueled for hours to days before launch and launch on short notice (2-3 days) after arrival at the launch site. Our launch service provides a number of key competencies: dedicated launch, custom orbital insertion, low cost, and a very short lead time. We target the following use customer types: * Commercial customers desiring rapid, guaranteed launch * Clients requiring a method of deployment and maintaining large nanosatellite constellations for communications, resource identification, and monitoring * Missions demanding specific orbits inaccessible through rideshare * Time-sensitive missions which require quick turnaround to launch * Spacecraft that need to be powered on and/or monitored real-time before deployment * Clients desiring to launch spacecraft with irregular volume and mass envelopes Aphelion Aerospace pursues an innovative launch service business model: * Our launch services are sold in a manner similar to airline ticketing * Regularly scheduled launches are provided to defined orbital inclinations * 30 days from cubesat acceptance to launch * “Gas and go” on-demand capability for dedicated launches on short notice * Full up-front price disclosure and guaranteed
Headquarters Regions: Greater Denver Area, Western US
Industry Groups: Science and Engineering, Transportation

The data in our application impacts how the team performs and is governed by a proprietary data-validation algorithm. There is no barrier to using the Athlogic application, it’s free to start using.   Conversations with college football players showed that recruiting today favors players from high-income, suburban and urban areas. Additional conversations with college coaches demonstrated that college football is reliant on an outdated, inefficient recruiting process. Because there are no sources of verified data on high school football statistics, and the pressure to recruit the best class of recruits, programs waste billions of dollars vetting recruits by traveling to areas that they believe have a historical, high density of talented athletes.

Description: Distributed Blockchain Processing
Full Description: UniCoin Blockchain is building a new kind of crypto mining ecosystem so profitable, it makes the centralized datacenter obsolete. With a novel micro-leasing approach and new technologies in hardware, firmware, UniCoin’s mining model that is better in every way. We eliminate infrastructure and spread energy loads across the grid to mine more efficiently than the competition, reducing environmental impact and increasing profits. UniCoin has created a new business model and technology for cryptocurrency mining. By using small, fractional spaces in occupied buildings, UniCoin creates a ‘distributed’ datacenter with its MINT mining platform. Our MINT is delivered on a pallet, plugged in to commercial power, and then begins mining immediately. Our model and MINT lets UniCoin scale very quickly- without hassle of construction, hefty leasing commitments, or working with the utility to bring in new lines for HUGE power demand. Instead, we simply install many MINTS in many buildings where the space and power are already available.  This transforms small pieces of real estate all across the country into UniCoin’s collective datacenter, paying the building owner a fee and Unicoin shareholders steady returns. Oh, and our technology uses 40% less energy and comes with no infrastructure build-out costs. Making UniCoin is the most profitable way to mine crypto available today. Own America’s most innovative, rapidly scalable crypto mining ecosystem and see your investment grow. Earth Friendly crypto mining that results in more profit for ALL!!

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), EdTech, Education, Language Learning, Machine Learning
Description: The only one completely passive AI-driven vocabulary-building app. We solve the biggest pain - the lack of time.
Full Description: Worddio is an AI-driven vocabulary-building app. We are growing our user base at a rapid pace because we offer our customers: - The unique feature to learn words without touching their smartphone. - 34 languages that cover 90% of the world's population. Our in-house AI/ML models help us in: - Building individual learning paths. - Optimizing marketing costs. - Deep user database segmentation (psychological, behavioral, and interests based) Customer Problem The main problem we face is the language barrier between peoples. This specifically applies to EU as a multi-lingual community. From other hand the biggest challenge for learning a foreign language is time. Advanced online technologies provide many learning opportunities but all of them require 100% focus for a long period of time which many people do not have. Products & Services To solve this problem, we turned the flashcards that students often use to memorize words into audio flashcards. Over 2000 people say that Worddio is a great tool for learning new words. With Worddio you can learn new words on the move or while doing something else, without touching your phone. Through this method, the learner will also memorize the pronunciation in the correct way, spoken by a native language speaker. We safe students time! Target Market The Worddio app is designed specifically for people learning a foreign language and who don't have time to learn and memorize new words. The Global Online Language Learning Market was valued at $12.49 billion in 2019 and is projected to reach $25.73 billion by 2027. With its 34 languages Worddio has potential usefulness for over 90% of the world population. Does it work? We have more than 200K installations and more than 1300 paying users. Business Model - subscriptions: 1, 3, 6 and 12 months, lifetime - up-sales of premium content - advanced flashcards by topics, Audiobooks and Podcasts. - Ads - general or targeted based on user profiles - Apply data & technology to other platforms/apps/fields . . . Developing a B2C model on a global level takes time and resources to break even, but once that happens, the return on investment is maximized at scale. Customer Segments Professionals: adults looking to improve their foreign-language skills for business or career reasons Casual learners: travelers, expats, or other persons wishing to learn a new language or enhance their current knowledge Sector-specific: Service workers, such as call-center staff or healthcare workers, who can perform better with a larger vocabulary and accurate pronunciation. Youth: 12-20 year-olds studying secondary languages in schools Sales & Marketing Strategy We have technology that allows us to build psychological profiles and predict users' behaviours without accessing their sensitive data. We can build bespoke learning paths, custom sales funnels, and target ads. The data gathered allow the pursue of three main objectives: optimzing marketing resources by leveraging predictive machine learning models creating individual learning paths based on users needs upsale of particular content or products Competitors The language learning apps space looks crowded but in fact there is a specific empty niche - passive learning. There are a lot of language learning apps on the market, but none of them use a passive learning method to save time for their users - Worddio is the only one that does. We are opening a new market group to support language learning. The Worddio app is a pseudo-passive learning app powered by AI which saves student time. Description: Order to-go food from restaurants making earth-friendly packaging choices.
Full Description: OUR MISSION JYBE wants to help solve the single-use plastic crisis by empowering and encouraging consumers to direct their meal delivery orders to restaurants that are using eco-friendly packaging. OUR PHILOSOPHY Information leads to better choices, and choice is power for consumers who want their purchases to reflect their social values. JYBE relies on its users to report back on what types of materials are being used in their food deliveries. We then promote those eateries making Earth-friendly packaging choices. For those restaurants that need some guidance making the transition, we’ll gladly consult on the best choices for their needs. Using JYBE to check which restaurants are most committed to sustainable packaging will help us accelerate the transition to eco-friendly products through consumer demand. Our goal is to educate diners and restaurants alike, and lead a cultural shift just like reusable supermarket shopping bags or the elimination of plastic straws. OUR MISSION TOWARDS SUSTAINABILITY In a perfect world, we’d eliminate all single-use items that are harmful to the environment. In the meantime, JYBE has prioritized readily available materials based on their sustainability and effectiveness that all restaurants can utilize.

Description: Atomic Alchemy is to become the world’s most reliable supplier of radioisotopes for medical, research, exploration, and industrial use
Full Description: Atomic Alchemy came from a problem that has been intensifying in the United States for decades: There is currently no dedicated domestic supplier for medical radioisotopes, such as Molybdenum-99. The United States is the largest consumer of radiopharmaceuticals in the world, yet produces a fraction of demand with university research reactors. While there is nothing inherently wrong with sourcing material from abroad, geopolitical issues with suppliers (Russia) or natural events (air freight disruptions due to volcanic eruptions) have caused--and will continue to cause--severe shortages (up to 50,000 procedures a day!) until a reliable, domestic supply from the private sector is established.
Headquarters Regions: Western US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: NeuroTechR3 is a Biomedical Device/Digital Health company that develops ML-driven rehabilitation technologies for persons with brain injury.
Full Description: NeuroTechR3 is a Biomedical Device/Digital Health start-up that develops affordable and versatile rehabilitation technologies for improving upper extremity function in individuals suffering from the effects of brain injury, such as stroke and cerebral palsy. Their innovation, R3THATM, makes personalized telerehabilitation possible by combining machine learning-driven cloud technology with exergames specifically designed to promote neuroplasticity integrating motion tracking, analytics and real-time biofeedback. NeuroTechR3 is dedicated to shifting the rehabilitation industry into a more proactive, patient-centered process by offering solutions for clinicians to balance the demand on efficiency with quality of care to improve patient recovery outcomes The company, founded 2020 by four women, is a spinout from New Jersey Institute of Technology Biomedical Engineering Department and Rutgers School of Health Professions. It currently has offices at VentureLink@NJIT in Newark, NJ, and at ic@3401 in Philadelphia, PA, and is well positioned in the local market through established relationships with rehabilitation hospitals, out-patient centers, and therapists. The core competence of the company is in using biomedical engineering and computer science to develop its technology. The founders/executive team draws from complementing skills with backgrounds in engineering, software development, digital design, and business development, which allows them to build a data driven, tech savvy, and innovative company with a clear focus on understanding exactly what is happening in our industry to be able to adapt quickly to create sustainable revenue streams. The company’s vision is to change the healthcare system for the better by becoming a disruptor in exergame rehabilitation, expanding this field by providing sustainable and accessible solutions for individuals with all types of impairments. By advancing rehabilitation devices and ML-driven technology, it will have a significant positive impact on people everywhere, contributing to the overall improvement of human health.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US

Description: An intelligent ERP/Supply chain solution that improves productivity by automating, tracking and streamlining workflows between contractors.
Full Description: Hi we are CommTrade and in current specific time we are already save money for a plastics trader. We are b2b software for raw material traders In order to produce many of the plastic objects we use in our daily lives in the US alone, 30,000 plastic traders lose 4 to 6 hours of employee work time on messy and tedious operational work.  Why?... Because the deals and shipment process is a mess. We come from the polymer trading industry. When we had to purchase and deliver raw materials for manufacturing, we spent hours on phone calls and meetings, working in excel spreadsheets and sending tons of documents. We tired of it and… We created CommTrade - an intelligent solution that improves productivity by automating, tracking and streamlining workflows between contractors. As results we cut 37% time of work per deal, get 17% more in annual revenue and total control of all business streams. We calculates that we saves over 1 thousand dollars per deal. An average trading company makes over 50 deals monthly. So we can provide monthly savings over 50 thousands for each company. For this we charge 1k dollars in monthly subscription for a basic product and we will go deeply in automation of business.  It is cheaper than big enterprise ERP systems (like SAP and Oracle) Our product is specifically designed for the polymer trading industry based on market expertise. We know which products need to be in this market. And of course we totally boost efficiency than traditional ways of doing business. There are some specifics of the polymers. The market is huge, but very interconnected and we’re focusing on small and medium distributors of plastics. Now after New York acceleration program we are finalizing a pilot with plastic trader and in the next months we will onboard customers form ready pipeline of companies. We want to generate capital of $100k for finishing 8 more pilots in target market and reach over $80k annual revenue. My partner owns a commodity trading company and has a Morgan Stanley background and market network, my experience is IT management in a big technology company and launching startups. We engaged a strong advisory board of experienced commodity players from Europe, US and global market. We are targeting on the distributed ecosystem for fully automated raw materials trading process and we know how to do it.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Information Technology, Manufacturing, Other, Sales and Marketing, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation

Description: Conversational Commerce
Full Description: E-commerce growth rates and margins are under pressure, so brands need new ways for "efficient growth" with fewer employees and smaller budgets. Unfortunately, most e-tailers are uncompetitive in "converting customers" because they have limited IT resources, insufficient know-how and small datasets. As a result, Brands with $50M-$1B in sales are missing out on $300 Billion in lost sales opportunities. Beagle Network innovated AI-supervised mini-robots that predict a buyer's intent with just a few clicks and customize the product details, user interface, and copy in real-time, making it a first-of-its-kind product in the market. The mini-robots also learn from a large data pool by experimenting with multiple clients at the same time, which solves the cold-start problem and quickly delivers results. Beagle Network is a team of Stanford graduates, Case Western PhDs, and AI Unicorn alums on their way to enabling millions of people with shopping innovations across all eCommerce touchpoints.

Description: Multicent is an investing Neobank and commerce company helping individuals and small and large companies accept payments.
Full Description: Multicent is a global technology company that builds economic infrastructure for the internet and for individuals. Multicent is an Investing Neobank and merchant & commerce services aggregator and mobile payment company that aims to simplify banking,  investing platforms, and commerce through technology. Multicent builds tools to allow young customers to open a banking account in local currency around the world,  buy & sell stocks, options trading, ETFs, and cryptocurrencies with zero commission,  and empower businesses and individuals to participate in the economy. Sellers use Multicent payments software to reach buyers online and in-person, run complex global operations, manage their business, open business account, and business credits, and access financing. Multicent has offices in the United States and is expanding to Canada, South-American, Japan, Australia, Ireland, Spain, the UK, and in Africa. with more than 410,000 on the waiting list. The company combines economic infrastructure with a set of applications for new business models like crowdfunding and marketplaces, fraud prevention, analytics, and more. Multicent navigates global regulatory uncertainty and partners closely with internet leaders like Apple, Google, Alipay, Tencent, Facebook, and Twitter to launch new capabilities and to accept online payments. It was founded in 2020 by Joshua Oduyemi and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.

Description: The operating system for exceptional software engineering teams
Full Description: Botany.io is the operating system for exceptional software engineering teams. We enable software organizations to maximize remote work, scale their engineering managers, and grow developers within critical “team” skills and behaviors. botany.io is a new workflow product being built to leverage the data interoperability of existing workplace tools. We empower teams/individuals to work smarter and better together. botany.io: - builds engineering growth & productivity through team-skills development, behavioral queues, and peer-feedback. - uses the data from existing development tools and engineering workflows to send behavioral nudges, actionable insights, and peer feedback in order to build team engagement and skill growth for the entire software development org. - is integrated directly into existing engineering workflows and dev-team tools like Slack, Github, & JIRA. - Enables and improves existing engineering workflows around pull requests & code reviews, activity feedback, data-driven 1:1s, and process "lint'ing". Initially targeted engineering workflow capabilities are within: - Pull Requests / Code Review Management (recommendations, behavioral nudges, & peer-review on feedback) - Engineering Manager Mentorship & Coaching ("data-driven 1:1 augmentation team skill-growth reports) - Development Team "Health & Skill-Growth" Tracking (behavioral nudges, activity tracking, insights & reports)

We leverage advanced natural language processing models trained on massive amounts of text to automatically produce articles, blog posts, product descriptions, and other text formats on virtually any topic specified by the user. The process begins with the user providing Rytr with a brief natural language description of the desired topic. Our algorithms then search thousands of trusted sources on the web to collect relevant facts, statistics, and insights. Finally, the intelligent software synthesizes all of this information into a cohesive, grammatically correct, and engaging text that is ready to be published. A major advantage of Rytr is its ability to generate text with a style and vocabulary similar to that written by humans. This makes the content more natural and enjoyable to read. Additionally, the system can produce completely original content on virtually any topic in a matter of seconds, saving users a significant amount of time. Here are some of the key features of Rytr: Personalized content: Rytr generates text that is tailored to the specific needs and preferences of each user. High quality: The content generated by Rytr is grammatically correct, well-structured, and engaging. Variety of formats: Rytr can generate text in a variety of formats, including articles, blog posts, product descriptions, and more. Time-saving: Rytr can produce content in a matter of seconds, freeing up users to focus on other tasks. If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use AI text generator, Rytr is the perfect solution for you. Try Rytr today and see how it can help you create high-quality content quickly and easily.

Full Description: Unity Partners Group owns the proprietary software for USADOCONCALL, Doc24seven, TRAVELDOK, ASIADOK and HOTELDOK trademarks and business platforms. Unity Partners. currently provides real-time consultation by multi-lingual, USA-certified physicians via our USADOCONCALL AND TRAVELDOK apps to smartphones anywhere and anytime.  USADOCONCALL (www.usadoconcall.com) is the first global Telehealth program designed for the global e-community. In association with telecom companies, affinity groups, membership businesses, HMOs, and mobile marketing companies. USADOCONCALL is a Telehealth service providing real-time consultations by USA-certified physicians. All physicians are based in the United States and are licensed under NCQA standards with an average of 10 years’ experience. Subscribers are able to upload all of their medical records and reports to a secured account and receive real-time opinions and consultations. TRAVELDOK (www.traveldok.com) is also the first global travel Telehealth service with no borders. During your travel anywhere in the world and if you’re feeling sick a doctor is just a click away! TRAVELDOK unique program with an active USA database of physicians via our app servicing by direct calls to your cell phone no matter what our service can be available. With the Covid 19 pandemic the importance of Telehealth has taken center stage in the world and no other Telehealth or Telehealth available that compares to our service. Via our Apps Doctors are available for you in minutes without the danger of exposing you or your loved ones and even the physicians of a dangerous virus. HOTELDOK is our unique concierge service providing hotel guests real time consults from USA Certified-Doctors preventing any sort of direct contact with physician. This service would be included with any hotel booking at a minimum cost to the hotel group. (Second Quarter 2022)  Doc24seven will feature Telehealth services into the Global community. Doc24seven will be utilizing our Global Telehealth platform (GTP) managing full-service Telehealth business in selected countries. Physicians will be recruited for consultations in our partner countries. Doc24seven will provide a free service for every subscriber using our apps and each subscriber will be able to find a doctor or the closest clinic or hospital. The service will identify the doctor for a live consultation and know the location and contact information to make an appointment with the doctor or visit a clinic or hospital as needed. POCKETCARE is our unique program driven to the Caribbean Islands Government and Tele-coo’s database. It focuses on providing local medical support to all residents and their families, a service that is not readily available in the current health scenario pre and post pandemic. Additional Services - Mental Health  Behavioral health includes the emotions and behaviors that affect your overall well-being. Behavioral health is sometimes called mental health and often includes substance use. Just like physical health, behavioral health has trained providers who can help you much like a physical health care provider would. Everyone has the strength to make important behavioral health changes, but many people are too nervous to talk about it during a health care visit. Asking for support comes with many benefits though. As communities gather around those in need, behavioral health providers are there to support you or your loved one throughout the journey. Virtual Counseling - Feeling overwhelmed, experiencing anxiety or depression? Now you can choose the mental health solution that’s just right for you! Consult with a Master Degreed Counselor. The amount of counseling sessions will be clinically appropriate based on the issue. This program is for short-term problem resolution, referral, and crisis intervention services. No Visit Fee Virtual Psychologist Service - Virtual Psychologist Service gives rapid access, lower costs, all from the comfort of your own home. Our licensed Psychologists (PhD, PsyD, or EdD) assess your symptoms, evaluate your medical and family history, and help determine a course of action moving forward. Medical Advise - Unity’s, USADOCONCALL Telehealth program is the first ever Telehealth service providing real- time second opinions from USA Certified Physicians. International subscribers will be able to upload all their medical records and medical reports into their secured USADOCONCALL account and receive real-time opinions and information. Our online second opinion program offers patients access to leading specialists, no matter where they live. If you are facing a complex medical issue or difficult treatment decision, having a second opinion from a team of world-class specialists can provide valuable guidance and peace of mind. Message a Specialist - Our members have the ability to ask any medical question to our expert team of board-certified physicians, psychologists, pharmacists, dentists, dietitians, and fitness trainers. Get advice and recommendations from trusted professionals when you need it most. Telehealth Monitor Kits at Home - COVID-19 aside, home health care providers are looking to push the envelope on care management and coordination. They’re using telemedicine technology, ranging from mHealth apps and connected devices to remote patient monitoring and smart home programs, to provide a continuous care experience, and one that balances clinical support with self-management. The kits allow care providers to connect virtually with patients to monitor vital signs and collect other data on a daily or weekly basis, and to see how patients go about their daily lives – a key factor in determining how to manage and adjust their care. Travel Kits PPE and Travel Sim Cards - Travel SIM is a roaming sim that allows you to access the internet and stay connected in more than 70 countries worldwide, without paying expensive roaming fees and with no hidden charges. Explore the wonders of the world with a reliable wireless service provider. Enjoy more data and unlimited call and text with the best promos created just for you. Travel Kit would include N-98 Nano Masks and Just Human 24 Hours Hand Sanitizers for your travel protection. Doctor Availability - Over 3,000 US-based certified doctors are available providing 24/7, 365-day coverage. Average response time is 20 minutes, with an average consultation time of 15 minutes. Multilingual with language lines. In some markets, Unity will procure local physicians to meet unique medical requirements. Description: Food technology to process industrial food & beverage byproducts into upcycled food ingredients at scale.
Full Description: NETZRO's patent pending technology powers the safe capture and conversion of industrial food & beverage byproducts into new sustainable upcycled food ingredients at scale. We are in the upcycled food tech industry with a US market opportunity of processing 6 billion pounds of food byproduct each year. We power food producers using upcycled ingredients. Our customers have a problem with the large amounts of valuable byproducts that they pay to discard. An example is liquid egg processing plants, which is often tons per day and costs thousands of dollars. We solve their problem by processing the byproducts in NETZRO’s proprietary equipment. We are different because we include our customers in the revenue stream of selling these new upcycled ingredients. This gives them the potential to not only reduce their cost of disposal but to also make money. This model allows NETZRO to secure the byproduct for commercialization. NETZRO makes money by licensing its technology and charging a licensing fee based on a charge per pound processed at the source, and we make revenue on brokering the upcycled food ingredients. We have partners in two sectors for proof of concept, egg breaking facilities for calcium and collagen from eggshell recovery and breweries & distilleries for spent grain recovery. We have successfully processed large volumes and have sold the new upcycled ingredients from both sectors. Let’s move the Earth’s food forward together.

Description: Divorce AI is a B2C divorce financial planner that can predict child support, alimony, asset separation options, future budget and more.
Full Description: Divorce AI is divorce financial reporting - a new category of intelligent tools that combine divorce and wealth management. Powered by Artificial Intelligence, expert knowledge, and comprehensive reporting technology, Divorce AI is built by people who care about families going through a divorce. Divorce AI enables you to find what's important, understand why it's important, and put that information to use in the most powerful way possible. In short, we turn your future divorce into an easy-to-read report. The average divorce costs a whopping $20,000. That number can quickly grow if you are not properly prepared for a divorce. That is why every divorce starts here. We estimate all of your post-divorce expenses and incomes, asset separation options, future budget, net worth, and more. We are trying to save you time and money by better preparing you for a divorce. Divorce AI helps you understand the financial implications of your divorce and estimates your post-divorce financials, so you can better execute and negotiate the terms of your divorce. We'll admit it. We are not pretending to be your lawyer. Instead, we are empowering you with valuable information so you can take back control when hiring a lawyer. The value Divorce AI offers is an ability to quickly research, calculate and estimate future divorce outcomes without paying large lawyer fees. Guess what? You can even download all of your Divorce AI reports and show them to your friends, future lawyers, or save them for later use. Divorce AI's technology allows for extremely affordable prices compared to other options. All you have to do is sign-up, answer a few short questions, and sit back while we do the rest. We will provide you with an easy-to-read Divorce AI report.

Description: An end-to-end, on-demand marketplace providing businesses and customers with the tools and resources to connect.
Full Description: Guard Grabber Technologies Inc. is the developer of a comprehensive marketplace designed to connect licensed professional businesses and the public in order to complete on-site and remote job opportunities. Guard Grabber’s patented software provides listed professionals with a complete set of work management tools enabling them to directly procure and manage their public profile, personal messages, bookings, work schedule, and payment requirements to optimize income and growth. Because professional businesses are booked directly for hire from their public profile, all issues stemming from quoting, bidding, and paying for leads are eliminated.  With Guard Grabber’s extensive network of available local professionals, customers are able to search, find, book, and pay for services within minutes, all in one place. In their search, customers will find each professional’s exact hourly, flat, and extra rates as well as their current and future availability, allowing customers to find the perfect match for hire. Customers also have the ability to filter their search based on service, zip code, miles away, price range, and current availability. When a professional is on the way to a scheduled booking, customers have the capability of tracking via GPS their professional's arrival. After a booking has been marked as completed, customers are able to leave live feedback for each professional.

Description: DocQ is a SaaS contract lifecycle management. It auto-populates contract templates from any source.
Full Description: Creating and managing contracts involves many steps. Moving between editors, emails, file-systems, and browsers reduces efficiency and precision. Information clutter can be overwhelming, redlines lost in crossed interactions, and contract renewal dates overlooked. DocQ is simplifying the way people work with contracts. It auto-populates contract templates from any source, such as customer databases, web-forms or cloud-based systems. It obtains secure digital signatures, mimics business processes, enables remote collaboration and reminds you when a contract expires. DocQ can achieve up to 40% higher revenues via automated and  efficient contract lifecycle management. It enables organizations to automate contract assembly by integrating data from CRM, ERPs and even web forms. Managing the entire lifecycle of contracts, proposals and quotes; from ingestion, secure storage, to archival is a breeze. DocQ mimics business processes to enable structured collaboration and obtains secure digital signatures. It even provides reminders before contracts might expire.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Internet Services, Privacy and Security, Sales and Marketing, Software
Founders: Anuj Sehgal, Jason Kadarusman, Ricardo de Oliveira Schmidt

Description: Pesto is a virtual office platform for remote teams with a virtual water cooler, avatars, and fast conversations.
Full Description: Pesto is a virtual office platform for remote teams with a virtual water cooler, avatars, and fast conversations. Their product enables remote workers to frictionlessly dive into impromptu conversations with audio channels and direct conversations, similar to a walkie-talkie. The product also allows you to feel more present with your team by helping you craft a unique digital identity with live avatars. Pesto's inspiration for the product was their own experience working remotely. Although they loved the flexibility that remote work enabled, they often struggled to build meaningful bonds with their teammates while working remotely - and Slack + Zoom was simply not cutting it. After spending months iterating with select remote teams to build the beta version, they believe that Pragli is ready to tackle the daily video collaboration problems of remote teams.

Description: Startup - The Next Evolution in B2B Social Style Media Platform - "Where Solutions & Challenges Meet to Become Innovations!"
Full Description: The Next Evolution in B2B Social Style Media. The Innovation Ecosystem Online Platform - "Where Solutions & Challenges Meet to Become Innovations!" Technology Ideation LLC as a startup with the ambition to develop the only “Innovation Ecosystem” that is open to all sciences, industries, technologies, services, and capabilities with a foundation built on the principles of LEAN Process Improvement. To truly be successful, this platform would need to challenge the current status quo of Stove Piping innovation into Silos of Subject Matter Experts whose efforts can be hindered by Learned Biases. This would be accomplished by tapping into a multitude of perspectives through implementation of a series of open format interactive “Ideation Forums” where new technologies, applications, and associated relationships will be ideated and established. These would then be transitioned to an online “Collaboration Platform” for further development, tracking and support through access to a “Private Collaboration Document Repository”, a “Schedule of Innovation & Collaboration Education & Support Tools”, a “Solution Development Incubator”, and an “Innovation & Ideation Messaging System”. The result of which would be an Ecosystem for “Driving Innovation from Ideation to Implementation”. I would like the opportunity to discuss this platform and funding in more detail.
Headquarters Regions: Tampa Bay Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Internet Services, Other, Professional Services
